posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jared
I'm interested in the following cards in "economic" condition to kick-start my collection.  Only thing I care about is eye appeal, so low-grade and raw cards are welcome.  [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

N28:  Any baseball player
N162:  Any baseball player

Please send scans, info, and witty commentary to jarharrington@yahoo.com.  Thanks!
